page.title: 17PINDERFIELDS HOSPITAL
page.content: 1I was sent to the accident and emergency department at Pinderfields General Hospital as part of my pre-nursing course. The Casualty department is the hospitals "Clearing House". Here your condition, whether minor or serious, will be assessed and you will be given whatever immediate treatment is needed before being discharged or transferred to another department. They have no particular routine in this department as different cases are brought in at all times whether during the day or at night. The staff working in this department are specialists in such emergency cases. They have to be alert at all times and prepared for the worst. I really enjoyed my time there and I am looking forward to my nursing course even more than before. YASMIN ASLAM
